blog/2016.html.title: 2016 - Time to start writing
blog/2016.html.blurb: 2016 - Time to start writing I've been meaning to get a blog up and running for about 5 years, but never really had the time to get things going. Now blog platforms, such as PyKwiki (the one I'm using now), make things so easy I no longer have...
